name: Sketch Financial Data Generator
tagline: A Sketch plugin to automatically generate data tables and charts
body:
### Generating tables and charts just got a lot easier.
![Usage Demo](http://media.tylernwolf.com.s3.amazonaws.com/gen_table2.gif)

### Get Started Now
1. Download the .zip or clone the Github repo above.
2. In the Sketch App, click "Plugins > Reveal Plugins Folder" from the top menu.
3. Place the "sketchfindatagen" folder in your plugins folder
4. Generate some charts and tables.

### Authors and Contributors
[Tyler Wolf](http://www.tylernwolf.com) (@thetylerwolf) created and wrote Sketch Financial Data Generator. Inspired by the need for an easy way to generate lots of convincing-looking fake data.

### Issues? Suggestions? Want to Say "Hi"?
Detailed Info about the plugin and how to use is available in the Readme.md file. If you're question isn't answered there, submit an issue on the Github repo issues page and we'll get right on it.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
